title: Desert tortoise
summary: The desert tortoise (Gopherus agassizii), is a species of tortoise in the family Testudinidae. The species is native to the Mojave and Sonoran Deserts of the southwestern United States and northwestern Mexico, and to the Sinaloan thornscrub of northwestern Mexico.[3] G. agassizii is distributed in western Arizona, southeastern California, southern Nevada, and southwestern Utah.[3]  The specific name agassizii is in honor of Swiss-American zoologist Jean Louis Rodolphe Agassiz.[4]
